task.summary: Default task
lots of updates including styles, accessibility, and error fixing.
performance updates, screenshot.png, added missing files to repo, bundled font awesome, enqueued only minified production js file
tagging as v1.01
updated support dashboard widget
added tags
removed sidebars.php from hybrid core

* 'unminified' files outside of production.js. * Unminifed version of all scripts are now provided. * footer credit link escaped * removed redundant singular.php * changed esc_attr to esc_url in author social icons function * changed esc_url to esc_url_raw
* added data validation for saving author social icons * added custom post editor styles
deleted singular.php
removed support widget from admin dashboard
* updated esc_attr to esc_url_raw when saving author social icons
* updated hybrid core to v2.0
* changed hybrid_post_class to post_class
* removed function to add class if has featured image
* changed menu registration method to work with hybrid 2.0 * added filter to add .excerpt class to posts on homepage
* added internationalization and conditional logic to search page. * updated to new classes for pages and search results
* removed uneccessary comment
* added disqus fix
* updated conditional IE logic in head
* added smaller image size for homepage to increase performance
* removed htmlshiv.js from production.js
* changed footer link to point to tracks homepage
* tagging as v1.04
* added compression to grunt * commented out tag to sidebars.php in hybrid to pass wordpress theme check
* had to delete sidebars.php to pass theme check even though it's not being used
* fixed bad checkbox and radio button styling
* tagging as v1.06
* fix for layout due to missing 'odd' 'even' classes
tagged as v1.07
* namespaced the global current class function
fixed input submit styling
added back to top arrow
add scroll to top link functionality
styled return-top link and increased distance to 400px before appearing.
fixed content-attachment.php
cleaner method for adding even/odd post classes
linked featured-images on archive pages. added image zoom effect on featured-image hover. Cleaned up comments and added control for showing/hiding return-to-top link
added return-to-top setting sanitization function
added output for hiding scroll-to-top link
added customizer setting for turning off the image zoom on hover and added output.
fixed transition styling on scroll-to-top link
changed scroll-to-top link to a button, improved styling, delayed now until 600px of scrolling
registering after-post-content widget
changed how featured image support is added
added after-post-content widget template part
added widget stylesheets and basic styling for after-post-content widget area
using hybrid for registering widgets for better HTML5 markup
styled widgets and widget area
moved widget registering to widgets_init
added after-page-content widget
added styling for after-post-content to after-page-content
updated tags
removed tappy which wasn't working when loaded asynchronously. Now using 'click' event on menu toggle.
mobile nav bug fixes
fixed html validation errors in head and fixed title underline style issue
tagging as v1.09
updated changelog. taggings as v1.10
registered secondary and footer menus
added additional menu template parts and added footer menu call to footer.php
styled footer menu
styled secondary menu and made huge improvements to primary nav dropdown
additional menu style updates
switch featured-image to padding-bottom % based
added description at wide screen sizes and updated secondary nav styling
added featured-image display to pages
added search bar to top-navigation
finished secondary-menu dropdowns and improved dropdowns on primary menu
style adjustments
refined top-nav search bar and search page
added option in customizer to show/hide search input
top-nav now displays properly depending on presence of search input or secondary menu
social media option added to customizer
added social icon output
add social media icon styling and updated to font awesome v4.1.0
added styling so secondary-menu, search, and social icons all play nice together
added social media icons to the footer
added social icon display options
added tagline display option
added conditional statements for blog tagline output
updates for cross-browser compatability
style update for ie9
deleted changelog
added missing text domain
tagging as v1.11
added basic theme options page.
moved theme options page to theme-options.php
required theme-options.php and added tabs (only visually)
added tab functionality and 'general' page content
added admin stylesheet and enqueued on theme options page
added content to support tab and added empty final two tabs
removed leftover commented code
minor update to theme-options copy
added customizer option for premium layouts and created css folder.
added premium layout stylesheets
added conditional enqueueing and body classes for stylesheets
license validation working. updated gruntfile for css folder.
started styling full-width layout.
simplified content.php
put category link functionality into a function
